events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a woman sitting on the floor of an airport, leaning forward with her head down, appearing distressed. events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a male speaker referring to an "optimum cruising speed guide" from a pilot's forum that lists "all the international aircraft used in these routes."
